comment.body: [I have tried](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1SunAWK2VUT9GQK32MpwRfFPVgcBSJN9a/18oD4Atz6dpapnpN75tiBorjCSjANJmaiw/1509649840). I couldn't open dat sites.

@Jackyggg: I've added the latest stable on ZeroUp: [beakerbrowser-0.7.7](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/18oD4Atz6dpapnpN75tiBorjCSjANJmaiw/beaker-browser-0.7.7-x86_64.tar.gz). Sorry for slow speed.

@Jackyggg: It is official AppImage from the beaker's github page. Now I remember that issue. Try to move it to your home directory. After that the app has started to work on my system (Debian Stretch).
Very fast for me. It is breaks my habits. I still using FF52.
